entry.title: Auckland, New Zealand
entry.content:
These photos were captured as part of a series to get footage for some new music videos. So far I haven't made any new music videos, but the footage made for some great photos!

This trip was a simple landing coming in to Auckland, New Zealand. The landing was a bit rough but the view was great!

entry.title: Canada
entry.content:
These photos were captured as part of a series to get footage for some new music videos. So far I haven't made any new music videos, but the footage made for some great photos!

I believe they were taken somewhere in south east Canada. I don't remember the exact location. Enjoy!

entry.title: Hiroshima, Japan
entry.content:
These photos were captured as part of a series to get footage for some new music videos. So far I haven't made any new music videos, but the footage made for some great photos!

Looking around the map for inspiration, I saw Hiroshima. We learn about how the atomic bomb was dropped there, so naturally I was curious to see what the city "actually" looks like today (virtually anyway). Plus I wanted to get a sense of scale for how big the city is.

I took off from the Iwakuni air base just a few miles south of the city itself. The whole trip was quite beautiful... and terrifying.

entry.title: New York City, New York
entry.content:
These photos were captured as part of a series to get footage for some new music videos. So far I haven't made any new music videos, but the footage made for some great photos!

It's always a fun time flying around New York, especially at night to make it extra moody. The scale of the buildings, the size of the city, it's a lot to take in. Highly recommend.

entry.title: Up North
entry.content:
These photos were captured as part of a series to get footage for some new music videos. So far I haven't made any new music videos, but the footage made for some great photos!

Super pleased with the photos I got from the trip. I believe it was from somewhere in Michigan, but I don't know where exactly. The moody purple lighting mixed with the landing by the lighthouse and the massive lake is just too beautiful.

entry.title: The First Ludo Air Gallery!
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

I'll created this website to demo my web design abilities and show off my flight sim adventures. Here's a variety pack of photos that I used for testing purposes. It's got a variety of good shots from the footage I've taken over the years.
